Select employees and sort them by joining date from oldest to newest.
options: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY joining_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees SORT BY joining_date;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER joining_date ASC;
ORDER BY employees SELECT joining_date ASC;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY joining_date ASC;

questions.question: Get all books sorted by title in descending order.
options: SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM books SORT title DESC;
DESC SELECT * FROM books ORDER title;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM books ORDER BY title DESC;

questions.question: Display students sorted by grade descending and name ascending.
options: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER grade DESC name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER DESC name ASC;
questions.answer: SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC, name ASC;
